regions.text:
HCC: Hepatocellular carcinoma; TCGA: The Cancer Genome Atlas; ICGC: International Cancer Genome Consortium; GEFA:
Gene-enrichment and Functional Annotation Analysis; LIRI-JP: The Liver Cancer, Riken Japan; BCE: Binary cross-entropy;
MSE: Mean squared error; Lc: Clustering-based loss; L,: Survival based loss; Ly: Reconstruction based loss; Lp-: Clustering
and reconstruction based combined loss; Lg: Survival and reconstruction. based combined loss; Lasc: Survival, clustering
and reconstruction-based combined loss; hybrid model.

regions.text:
Additional file 1: Supplementary Tables. Table $1. Results from the univariate cox models for each bottleneck
feature for best run of LRSC. Table $2. Methylation features consistently identified in ten runs of LRSC that are
significant for prognosis.

the Brainwaves Northern Ireland Charity (Registered Charity Number: NIC103464) to KMP. The funders played no role in
the collection, analysis, interpretation of data or in the writing of the manuscript.

regions.text:
TCGA data was downloaded using TCGA-Assembler 2 which can be accessed on https://github.com/compgenome365/
TCGA-Assembler-2. LIRI-JP data was accessed using HCCDB which can be found on http://lifeome.net/database/hccdb/
home.html. All source code developed by this study is publicly available at: https://github.com/aowens-code/DeepL
earningSurvivalClustering.

regions.text:
1. European Association For The Study Of The Liver. EASL clinical practice guidelines: management of hepatocellular
carcinoma. J Hepatol. 2018;69(1):182-236.

2. El-Serag HB. Epidemiology of viral hepatitis and hepatocellular carcinoma. Gastroenterology. 2012;142(6):1264-1273.
el.

3. Ghouri YA, Mian |, Rowe JH. Review of hepatocellular carcinoma: Epidemiology, etiology, and carcinogenesis. J
Carcinog. 2017;16:1.

4. Poirion OB, Chaudhary K, Garmire LX. Deep Learning data integration for better risk stratification models of bladder
cancer. AMIA Jt Summits Trans! Sci. 2018;2017:197-206.

5. ZhangL,LvC, Jin Y, Cheng G, Fu Y, Yuan D, et al. Deep learning-based multi-omics data integration reveals two prog-
nostic subtypes in high-risk neuroblastoma. Front Genet. 2018;9:477. https://doi.org/10.3389/fgene.201 8.00477.

6. Chaudhary K, Poirion OB, Lu L, Garmire LX. Deep learning-based multi-omics integration robustly predicts survival in
liver cancer. Clin Cancer Res. 2018;24(6):1248-59.
